description.p: A simple operating system installer, intended to be used with live install systems. It provides a GNOME Adwaita-style interface with: Configurable installer steps, including: Language, keyboard, internet connection, disk selection, user configuration Customizability: Welcome page, desktop choice, installation slideshow, additional software options * Over 25 translations. All custom texts are fully translatable.

ul.li: Working translations independent of system languages
Support for more scripting languages, e.g. Python and Lua
Simpler disk/partition selection with expander rows
Config can be passed as CLI parameter
Faster search for timezone and region lists
Internal refactorings for a cleaner code base
Added translations (Farsi, Hebrew, Kabyle, Tamil, Vietnamese) and updated existing translations
